projects.name: Evidentia
projects.description: Evidentia is a decentralized finance protocol that enables users to mint local stablecoins (e.g., eUAH, eTRY, eVND) fully backed by tokenized government bonds, provided by collateral holders as NFTs. It serves  for bondholders and offering staking for yield generation. The platform integrates with decentralized and centralized exchanges, lending markets, and supports applications such as cross-border payments and e-commerce, maintaining stringent compliance.

projects.name: funOption
projects.additionalInfo:
Our Old X account (https://x.com/funoption_fi) was flagged for sending too many DMs and has been temporarily suspended.
What it does.

FunOption ‚Äî Hyper-Casual Crypto Options


FunOption turns options trading into a game-like experience:

1. Drag-and-Drop Canvas‚Äì Build a position by dragging option blocks onto the board. Strikes are picked point-by-point on an intuitive slider, so even first-timers can ‚Äústack‚Äù strategies in seconds.
2. On-/Off-Chain Data Fusion ‚Äì Each block merges live on-chain metrics from Solana (implied volatility, liquidity, open interest) with off-chain feeds‚Äîorder-book depth, macro headlines, sentiment scores‚Äîso traders see the full picture in one place.
3. AI Risk Buddy‚Äì Lightweight time-series models forecast price paths and translate greeks into plain English tips (‚Äú‚âà75 % chance to reach 3√ó payoff; suggest +1 protective put‚Äù).
4. One-Swipe Settlement ‚Äì Review, sign, and settle on-chain with a single swipe. Every trade awards XP and unlocks fee discounts, keeping the learning loop fun and rewarding.
                      |

By removing complexity and adding real-time guidance, FunOption lowers the barrier for millions of crypto traders who want effective hedging without the typical options headache.

projects.name: AuctionX
projects.description:
AuctionX is a decentralized auction platform designed for transparent and trustless bidding on both digital and physical items. Built with Web3 technologies, it allows users to create auctions, place bids using crypto (e.g. USDC), and verify ownership through wallet-based authentication (e.g. Solana wallet signatures). Key features include:

Decentralized ownership & bidding: No middlemen‚Äîusers interact directly with smart contracts.

Real-time auctions: Live countdowns and dynamic bid updates.

Digital/physical item support: NFTs, collectibles, or real-world assets.

Wallet login & signature auth: Secure login without passwords.

Optional rewards/incentives: For active bidders or auction creators.

AuctionX aims to bridge the gap between Web2 usability and Web3 transparency in online auctions.
projects.additionalInfo:
Live link - https://auction-x.vercel.app/

projects.name: Utopia
projects.description: Utopia is a no-code, decentralized voting platform built on the Solana blockchain that solves the widespread distrust, complexity, and high cost of traditional voting systems. In a country like Sierra Leone‚Äîwhere even student elections or reality show votes can trigger conflict‚ÄîUtopia empowers universities, organizations, and event managers to launch transparent, tamper-proof elections without technical barriers. With features like self-serve poll creation, configurable voting rules, pay-to-vote options, and real-time on-chain results, Utopia makes every vote count‚Äîinstantly, anonymously, and verifiably. More than just a product, it‚Äôs a movement toward restoring trust in democratic processes.

teamMembers.aboutYou: I am THE MAN THE MYTH THE LEGEND

projects.name: Something.cool & Cooldex.cool
projects.description:
Problem:
DEX trading today charges 0.25‚Äì5% in fees on every trade ‚Äî then just adds that money back into liquidity pools. On Solana alone, over $1.4B has been locked into liq.pools of tokens that didn‚Äôt survive 2 hours. But those fees could‚Äôve been redistributed differently ‚Äî creating incentive for holders to stay, without placing additional costs on traders

Solution:
CoolDEX is the first-ever DEX that auto-distributes fees to real-time holders of the traded token ‚Äî with no staking, no locking, and no dev-side control. Just hold = get rewarded.

For the first time in Web3, trading volume directly benefits the community behind the token ‚Äî not just LPs.

Right now, only flippers win. 
With our tech, projects gain a base of loyal holders ‚Äî reducing sell pressure and giving traders more confidence to play.
Both sides win. No value extraction.

CEO - t.me/LEOresearch
projects.additionalInfo:
Imagine you‚Äôre trading a new token on Solana. You buy. You hold. You help build the community. 
Volume goes up. Traders flow in. Everyone pays DEX fees.

But none of those fees reward you.
Not your community. Not other holders.
They just get added back to the LP ‚Äî or go to people staking a completely different launchpad token.

You contribute. You hold.
But you get nothing back.

Fair? We don‚Äôt think so.

So we built CoolDEX ‚Äî the first-ever DEX where trading fees can go to real-time holders of the token being traded, not just LPs.
No staking. No locking. No dev control.
Just automated distribution after every trade ‚Äî fully on-chain, built on SPL.
Just hold tokens in any wallet (like Phantom), and get rewarded.

How it works:
Tokens launch via Somethingcool, where creators configure how the DEX fee splits: real-time holders, LPs, burn ‚Äî in any ratio. After the bonding curve, liquidity migrates to CoolDEX, and fee distribution activates automatically.

We‚Äôre not just building a new DEX.
We‚Äôre rewriting the incentive structure behind DEX trading.

üìé Docs: https://docs.something.cool/
üé• 1-min explainer: https://x.com/somethingco_ol/status/1882461562507829362
üë§ CEO: t.me/LEOresearch

Community co-ownership projects and PVE aren‚Äôt just ideas anymore ‚Äî we made them real.
First time in Web3.
Exclusively on Solana.

projects.name: Next Man Up Daily Fantasy Sports
projects.description: Next Man Up Daily Fantasy Sports is a decentralized fantasy sports app on Solana where users enter skill-based prop bets, with funds managed through isolated liquidity pools for each stat line. The fully on-chain system handles entry, result publishing, and claim settlement with a fast, non-custodial UI. While the current version excludes NFTs, upcoming features will introduce NFT-based betting slips and a secondary market for hedging or trading picks. Users can also explore their wallet balances, view coin analytics, and trade tokens via Jupiter‚Äîall within the same platform.
projects.additionalInfo:
Website: https://nextmanup.io/

The current version of Next Man Up includes a full Solana smart contract and frontend for decentralized fantasy prop betting. Features like wallet-based entry, on-chain claim settlement, and stat-specific liquidity pools are fully implemented. Upcoming features include NFT-based pick receipts and secondary market trading for hedging. Users can also view wallet balances, coin analytics, and trade via Jupiter‚Äîall within the same UI.


React JS front end: https://github.com/nhowze/ici-daily-fantasy-reactJS
Express Server: https://github.com/nhowze/ici-daily-fantasy-middleware
Smart Contract: https://github.com/nhowze/ici-daily-fantasy-smart-contract

projects.name: Pathfinders: Storybook
projects.description:
A Storybook experience optimized for gamers on SOL. Designed to tap into the core of what made NFTs fun, this experience allows holders to mint a soulbound NFT, take it on a choose-your-own-adventure story in five chapters, while watching it evolve and change based on decisions made. Every element of this experience is designed for Web3: with game loops involving trait-acquisition and our first experiment in a broader Living NFT concept.

Breathing life into NFTs. Brought to you by Pathfinders.
projects.additionalInfo:
https://colosseum.pathfinders.gg/
https://pathfinders.gg/

How to play?

To play Pathfinders: Storybook visit the first link above. On the site you can mint a soulbound Pathfinder for 0.2 SOL to start your journey!

A Note on Development

Last year we did spin up a very simple proof-of-concept of Ch. 1 of our Storybook. This was done in late Q4 just after our mint and was then put on the back-burner.

However, using the Colosseum as our motivation over the last two months we have spun that simple demo experience into a full game. Over 80% of the work for this game, and almost all core features have been designed and built in the Colosseum period.

In particular, during this period we built: a soulbound NFT system, a wardrobe, a log system, and four out of five of the core chapters of the game. In essence, we've taken the game from concept to end-product at breakneck pace. We've told a complete story with our IP and we hope you enjoy it!

projects.name: Holo (Synthetics)
projects.description:
Holo is set to become the premier platform for tokenizing real-world assets (RWAs) on Solana, aiming to enable users to seamlessly transition from high-volatility, risk-on assets to low-volatility, risk-off assets without leaving the DeFi space. 

These synthetic tokens will closely track the prices of real-world assets, such as stocks, commodities, bonds, and other instruments. Classified as utility tokens within the European Economic Area (EEA), they can be traded under the same regulatory framework as other standard crypto assets.

Holo will bring the following benefits:
- No KYC or AML requirements 
- Diversified asset exposure within a single, permissionless DeFi ecosystem
- Buy stocks without having to sell your crypto
- Borrow against your synthetics 
- Tap into a new era of low-impermanent-loss liquidity mining
- Open a new vertical for arbitrage trading between DEX and traditional finance
- Integrate a new asset class to drive DeFi innovation
projects.additionalInfo:
Try our EVM deployment - jAssets - here: https://jassets.org/balance 

jAsset statistics: https://jellyverse-ecosystem.com/jAssets

Previous project: https://app.jellyverse.org/jellyswap

Important note: We put our best effort into developing a functional demo for the Hackathon that represents the basic idea of Holo. However, due to the system‚Äôs complexity, it wasn‚Äôt feasible to fully port the entire protocol to Solana at this stage. Over the coming weeks, leading up to the conclusion of the Hackathon, we‚Äôll continue preparing for this transition and begin exploring significant new concepts, such as the implementation of concentrated liquidity. That said, these updates involve in-depth theoretical work and scoping, which cannot be completed immediately and won‚Äôt be reflected in the GitHub repository over the next weeks. 

If you‚Äôd like to follow our progress in the coming weeks, we‚Äôd be happy to get in touch!
